channel.title: So what's it gonna take to get this running with Synergy?
channel.description: I'm going to take an completely uneducated guess and say it shouldn't be TOO hard, right? Since it's all Source and stuff.

item.title: So what's it gonna take to get this running with Synergy?
item.dc:creator: Hell-met
item.description:
nearly all npcs have code and behavior that is completely non-existent in hl2, aswell as inputs and entities exclusive to bms.

so this will never happen.

the levels and graphics though should work flawlessly

Read full topic
